entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
